outputs.output_descr:
•  To demobilise and reintegrate special target groups: Children Associated with Armed Forces and Groups (CAAFG), Women Associated with Armed Forces and Groups (WAAFG) and disabled ex-combatants-coordinated with protection and human rights education and vocational training sectors.  

•  To build the capacity of national authorities in the North and South to plan and implement the multi-year DDR programme. 

•  To support the implementation of the national arms reduction and control programme at state and community levels.

•  To establish a Community Security Fund (CSF) to support security enhancement activities in high risk communities.

project_descr: Interim Disarmament, Demobilization and Reintegration Programme
